exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoginBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="566" height="80"
        currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height.down="80">
	<e:Image source.up="loginBtn1_png" source.down="loginBtn2_png" source.disabled="loginBtn3_png" source="loginBtn1_png" left="0" right="0" scale9Grid="87,9,387,60" scale9Grid.up="81,9,404,60" scale9Grid.down="82,9,400,58" verticalCenter="0" verticalCenter.down="0"/>
	<e:Label text="登录" size="40" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0xffffff" verticalCenter="0" verticalCenter.disabled="0" verticalCenter.down="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoginInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="78" width="577">
	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay"
	                width="561" height="40" size="35"  textColor.disabled="0xF1DFDF" height.normalWithPrompt="40" verticalAlign.normalWithPrompt="middle" x="17" y="25" textColor="0x000000"/>
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay"
	         height="40" size="35" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" verticalAlign.normalWithPrompt="middle" y="25" width="561" x="17" textColor="0x36382b"/>
	<e:Image source="line_long_png" y="74" left="0" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ChatListSkin" width="586" height="48" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="_labels" x="18" y="0" width="568" height="41" verticalAlign="middle" size="20" bold="true" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x814C28"/>
	<e:Image source="img_line" width="560" y="45" x="13"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ChatPaoSkin" width="336" height="86" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="match_pic_pop" scale9Grid="22,14,53,4" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="10"/>
	<e:Image id="_biao" source="match_pic_jian" bottom="0" x="301"/>
	<e:Label id="_txt" x="22" y="5" width="301" height="58" size="20" bold="true" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" lineSpacing="5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ChatSkin" width="670" height="388" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="panel_1" y="41" width="586" height="288" scale9Grid="19,19,25,17" x="42"/>
	<e:Scroller width="586" height="288" x="41" y="41">
		<e:Group id="_group">
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CreateSkin" width="792" height="510" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:mui="mui.*" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="panel_1" width="688" height="383" scale9Grid="20,20,23,15" y="95" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label verticalAlign="middle" y="113" height="35" text="房间模式:" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="right" width="128" size="24" x="63" textColor="0xA07A4B" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label y="186" textColor="0xA07A4B" height="35" text="房间说明:" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="right" width="128" size="24" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" x="63"/>
	<e:Label id="_tq1" verticalAlign="middle" y="148" height="28" text="（2圈）房卡x4" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="174" size="16" x="130" textColor="0xA07A4B" touchEnabled="false" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label id="_tg1" y="191" textColor="0xA07A4B" height="28" text="夹五" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="100" size="18" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" x="213" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="_tg4" y="238" textColor="0xA07A4B" size="18" text="鸡胡鸡飘" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="100" height="28" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" x="213" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="_tg7" y="285" textColor="0xA07A4B" height="28" text="背靠背" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="100" size="18" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" x="213" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label y="352" textColor="0xA07A4B" height="28" text="注：牌局未开始解散房间，则退回房卡!" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="579" size="16" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Label id="_tg2" y="191" textColor="0xA07A4B" size="18" text="清一色" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="100" height="28" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" x="393" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="_tg5" y="238" textColor="0xA07A4B" height="28" text="攒杠" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="100" size="18" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" x="393" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="_tg8" y="191" textColor="0xA07A4B" size="18" text="责任制" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="100" height="28" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" x="553" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="_tg3" y="191" textColor="0xA07A4B" height="28" text="扣听" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="100" size="18" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" x="553" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="_tg6" y="238" textColor="0xA07A4B" size="18" text="手把一" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="100" height="28" touchEnabled="false" verticalAlign="middle" x="553" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="_tq2" y="148" textColor="0xA07A4B" height="28" text="（4圈）房卡x6" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="162" size="16" verticalAlign="middle" x="341" touchEnabled="false" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label id="_tq3" y="148" textColor="0xA07A4B" size="16" text="（8圈）房卡x12" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="167" height="28" verticalAlign="middle" x="543" touchEnabled="false" bold="true"/>
	<e:Image id="_center_btn" source="select_center" y="113" x="327"/>
	<e:Image id="_lef_btn" source="select_left" x="197" y="113"/>
	<e:Image id="_right_btn" source="select_right" x="509" y="113"/>
	<e:Image id="_riado" source="room_btn" x="198" y="113" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_suiji" source="random_img" x="315" y="418" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image source="img_line" y="382" width="632" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="_edit" x="220" y="414" width="94" height="35" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="24" bold="true" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0xA07A4B" text="0000" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label text="游戏开始后解散房间需要所有玩家投票同意，否则不能解散，当达到指定圈数后玩家将自动退出房间。" x="187" y="228" textColor="0xa07a4b" width="441" height="98" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="DialogSkin" width="825" height="539" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="_dialog_bg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="loadingeff_bg" scale9Grid="61,59,30,32"/>
	<e:Image id="_title_img" source="dialog_head_img" horizontalCenter="0" top="8"/>
	<e:Image id="_title" source="shop_txt" top="23" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="DissolutionSkin" width="670" height="388" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="panel_1" width="586" height="190" x="42" y="99" scale9Grid="19,19,25,16" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="_img1" x="260" y="133" source="diss_dui"/>
	<e:Image id="_img2" y="133" x="520" source="diss_dui"/>
	<e:Image id="_img3" source="diss_dui" y="203" x="260"/>
	<e:Image id="_img4" source="diss_dui" y="203" x="520"/>
	<e:Label id="_label1" x="24" y="134" width="224" height="38" textColor="0xA07A4B" size="18" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="right" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label id="_label2" y="134" textColor="0xA07A4B" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="right" bold="true" width="224" size="18" height="38" x="284"/>
	<e:Label id="_label3" y="204" textColor="0xA07A4B" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="right" bold="true" width="224" size="18" height="38" x="24"/>
	<e:Label id="_label4" y="204" textColor="0xA07A4B" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="right" bold="true" width="224" size="18" height="38" x="284"/>
	<e:Label id="time_text" x="72" y="256" width="529" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="20" bold="true" fontFamily="微软雅黑" height="30" textColor="0xA07A4B"/>
	<e:Label id="_desc" y="311" width="427" height="34" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" textColor="0xBC4741" horizontalCenter="0" text="请等待其他玩家表态"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HornSkin" width="718" height="38" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="horn_bg" alpha="0.6" left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="0" scale9Grid="103,9,621,26"/>
	<e:Image id="_horn" source="horn_icon" x="24" y="4"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="JoinPasswordSkin" width="792" height="484" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="_warm" y="122" textColor="0xA07A4B" size="20" text="请输入密码：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="right" width="282" height="36" verticalAlign="middle" x="87"/>
	<e:Label id="_desc" y="88" textColor="0xA07A4B" size="16" text="输入密码，即可开始游戏。密码是由开房人设置的哦。" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="444" height="27" verticalAlign="middle" x="174"/>
	<e:Image source="create_password_bg" x="370" y="121" width="180" scale9Grid="6,6,36,26"/>
	<e:Label id="_edit" y="122" size="24" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="175" height="34" verticalAlign="middle" x="372" textColor="0xFFFFFF" bold="true" text="0"/>
	<e:Image source="panel_1" y="173" horizontalCenter="0" scale9Grid="20,20,23,15" width="688" height="276" x="10"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="375" id="_img0" x="325"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="189" x="161" id="_img1"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="189" id="_img2" x="325"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="189" id="_img3" x="490"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="251" id="_img4" x="161"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="251" id="_img5" x="325"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="251" id="_img6" x="490"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="313" id="_img7" x="161"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="313" id="_img8" x="325"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="313" id="_img9" x="490"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="375" id="_img10" x="161"/>
	<e:Image source="clickeff_of_btn" y="375" id="_img11" x="490"/>
	<e:Label id="_t0" y="379" text="0" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="331"/>
	<e:Label id="_t1" y="192" text="1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="166"/>
	<e:Label id="_t2" y="192" text="2" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="331"/>
	<e:Label id="_t3" y="192" text="3" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="493"/>
	<e:Label id="_t4" y="254" text="4" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="166"/>
	<e:Label id="_t5" y="254" text="5" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="331"/>
	<e:Label id="_t6" y="254" text="6" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="493"/>
	<e:Label id="_t7" y="316" text="7" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="166"/>
	<e:Label id="_t8" y="316" text="8" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="331"/>
	<e:Label id="_t9" y="316" text="9" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="493"/>
	<e:Label id="_t10" y="379" text="删除" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="166"/>
	<e:Label id="_t11" y="379" text="确定" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" verticalAlign="middle" x="494"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="JoinSkin" width="732" height="484" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="_group" height="66" width="421" y="101" x="156">
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="20" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Rect height="4" width="405" y="153" fillColor="0x0B941D" x="164"/>
	<e:Image id="_img0" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="365" x="285"/>
	<e:Image id="_img1" x="121" y="179" source="clickeff_of_btn"/>
	<e:Image id="_img2" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="179" x="285"/>
	<e:Image id="_img3" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="179" x="450"/>
	<e:Image id="_img4" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="241" x="121"/>
	<e:Image id="_img5" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="241" x="285"/>
	<e:Image id="_img6" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="241" x="450"/>
	<e:Image id="_img7" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="303" x="121"/>
	<e:Image id="_img8" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="303" x="285"/>
	<e:Image id="_img9" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="303" x="450"/>
	<e:Image id="_img10" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="365" x="121"/>
	<e:Image id="_img11" source="clickeff_of_btn" y="365" x="450"/>
	<e:Label id="_t0" y="369" verticalAlign="middle" text="0" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="291"/>
	<e:Label id="_t1" y="182" verticalAlign="middle" text="1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="126"/>
	<e:Label id="_t2" text="2" x="291" y="182" width="152" height="54" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Label id="_t3" y="182" verticalAlign="middle" text="3" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="453"/>
	<e:Label id="_t4" y="244" verticalAlign="middle" text="4" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="126"/>
	<e:Label id="_t5" y="244" verticalAlign="middle" text="5" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="291"/>
	<e:Label id="_t6" y="244" verticalAlign="middle" text="6" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="453"/>
	<e:Label id="_t7" y="306" verticalAlign="middle" text="7" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="126"/>
	<e:Label id="_t8" y="306" verticalAlign="middle" text="8" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="291"/>
	<e:Label id="_t9" y="306" verticalAlign="middle" text="9" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="453"/>
	<e:Label id="_t10" y="369" verticalAlign="middle" text="删除" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="126"/>
	<e:Label id="_t11" y="369" verticalAlign="middle" text="确定" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="152" height="54" x="454"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoginSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="loading,login" >
	<e:Image id="_bg_img" width="640" y="0" source="game_scene" height="960" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="_loading_group" height="225" width="368" horizontalCenter="0" visible.login="false" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="loadingeff_bg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="26,25,98,98"/>
		<e:Label id="_label_info" y="21" width="331" height="38" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xA44E30" bold="true" size="20" text="正在登陆游戏..." x="18" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Label id="load_jindu" y="100" textColor="0xA44E30" height="57" text="0%" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="79" size="25" verticalAlign="middle" x="146"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="login_group" width="580" height="468" verticalCenter="17" visible.loading="false" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="loadingeff_bg" scale9Grid="26,25,98,98" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="580" height="378"/>
		<e:TextInput id="username" y="36" width="426" skinName="LoginInputSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="26"/>
		<e:TextInput id="password" width="426" y="130" skinName="LoginInputSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="26"/>
		<e:Image source="unameIcon_png" x="58" y="52" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="passwordIcon_png" x="58" y="148" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Button id="loginBtn" skinName="LoginBtnSkin" y="262" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="118" width="372"/>
		<e:Button id="registerBtn" label="注册" y="262" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="372" horizontalCenter="14">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="loginBtn1_png" source.down="loginBtn2_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="40" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label id="registerPot" text=">>>立即注册" x="360" size="35" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label id="backLoginPot" text=">>>返回登录" x="360" size="35" bottom="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="mainSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg_img" width="960" x="0" y="0" source="game_scene"/>
	<e:Image source="notice_bg" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group id="head_group" height="120" width="273" left="0" top="0">
		<e:Image source="head_bg" x="4" y="0"/>
		<e:Image id="_head" source="head_001" x="13" y="9"/>
		<e:Image id="_head_click" x="4" y="0" source="head_kuang_bg"/>
		<e:Label id="_name" text="ttxna" x="12" y="87" size="16" width="79" height="30" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="微软雅黑" bold="true" maxWidth="163" maxHeight="33" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
		<e:Label id="_uid" y="84" size="16" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="102" height="33" verticalAlign="middle" x="2" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image source="money_bg" x="94" y="46" width="182" scale9Grid="19,17,19,5"/>
		<e:Image id="_money" source="money_icon" x="95" y="41"/>
		<e:Label id="_money_text" x="143" verticalAlign="middle" y="49" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="99" height="33"/>
		<e:Image id="btn_add" source="card_add" x="232" y="41"/>
		<e:Image source="money_bg" x="94" y="5" width="182" scale9Grid="19,17,19,5"/>
		<e:Image id="_currency" x="95" y="0" source="currency_icon_png" width="51" height="49"/>
		<e:Label id="_currency_text" x="143" verticalAlign="middle" y="8" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="99" height="33"/>
		<e:Image id="btn_curr_add" source="card_add" x="232" y="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="icon_group" width="311" height="112" right="10" top="0">
		<e:layout>
			<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
